!Sir Eric Rodemai: Welcome to Aden Castle Town. I am Eric Rodemai, one of the court guards. Oren is the center of military affairs and Giran is the center of commerce& And here, Aden is considered the center of politics, culture and religion. Hearing this, you may think that the place has the bustling atmosphere of a metropolitan area. But due to its proximity to the border with Elmore, it always tends to maintain a somewhat tense atmosphere. The two types of atmosphere are always co-mingling creating a unique balance.
